johnodon/inkscape.ModeratorComment: This app appears to have been abandonded.  An alternative inkscape exists in SmartPhoneLover's Repository

snoopy86/flickr-uploader.ModeratorComment: Deprecated due to no updates to the app since 2016.  May ultimately be blacklisted because the author's GitHub repository building this container no longer exists

dax333/cron-streamripper.ModeratorComment: This project has been abandonded, with no updates since 2009

bjonness406/convert2mkv.ModeratorComment: This app appears to have been abandonded, with no updates since 2016.  Advised to utilize instead MakeMKV from DJoss

activ/arch-lazylibrarian.ModeratorComment: With no updates since 2017 this app is now deprecated.  Advised to instead use the version from linuxserver

activ/arch-flexget.ModeratorComment: This app appears to be abandonded, with no updates to match the actual application since 2017

appcelerator/telegraf:latest.ModeratorComment: This app has been abandonded.  Advised to use the official release with Apps instead

owncloud.ModeratorComment: This official image is no longer receiving any updates (since 2018) and is deprecated.  You will need to change the repository of this app to instead be owncloud/server

reimashi/emule.CAComment: This project appears to have been abandoned

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gfjard.ModeratorComment: This version of preclear is now being tagged as being incompatible with Unraid 6.9.0+  Highly advised to switch to Unassigned Devices Preclear or Binhex Preclear

paulpoco/node:v3.4.0-alpha2.CAComment: This app is setup by default to communicate to a VPN via the binhex-delugevpn container

benbusby/whoogle-search.CAComment: It appears that after installation you have to run a command to get this application to work: See here

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GuildD.ModeratorComment: A fork attempting to keep this plugin running on 6.10.0 is now available.  See also the support thread for more details

dperson/openvpn-client.ModeratorComment: If you were using OpenVPN-Client from ich777, you should migrate over to the maintained version, since the original container author dperson is now MIA.   If you were using OpenVPN-antizapret, then pretty much the only differences between the now maintained version from Ich777 is how the environment variables were setup.  All the additional running of scripts etc *should* still work

jshridha/docker-nzbgetvpn.CAComment: The entry for VPN_REMOTE needs to be changed from nl.privateinternetaccess.com to instead be www.privateinternetaccess.com

siwatinc/phlex.ModeratorComment: This project is dead, and the replacement FlexTV is currently on hiatus https://github.com/d8ahazard/FlexTV/issues/39

kanboard/kanboard.CAComment: The default login and password is admin/admin

speedmon.ModeratorComment: Repository no longer exists on dockerHub

nextcloud/all-in-one:latest.CAComment: Very highly recommended to watch a setup video for this application, as it is not a turn-key solution and requires a lot of setup.  If you simply want to run Nextcloud, it would be far easier to run Nextcloud / Owncloud and not the 'all-in-one'

sameersbn/redis.CAComment: Template is nowhere near complete, missing ports etc etc.  Others are complete.  This is a legacy one though and possibly in use, so just quietly remove it to stop new installs

erikdevries/spotweb.ModeratorComment: This container will not install or reinstall and constantly aborts the installation pull. See HERE for more details

cr.hotio.dev/hotio/scrutiny.ModeratorComment: Deprecated by Hotio on his Discord announcement thread

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dmacia.Requires: Python 2 either installed via the plugins NerdPack ( earlier than 6.11.0) or Python 2 (6.11.0+)

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dmacia.CAComment: Only advanced users should consider installing this

https://raw.github.com/bergware/dynamix/.CAComment: It's more important to delete the .xml, not the .plg @bergware

theoriginalbrian/roboexec.CAComment: Don't publish something with a description of DO NOT USE

minio/minio.CAComment: Unfortunately due to changes in Minio, the unRAID file system is no longer supported. The only way to get Minio to work on unRAID now is by mapping a single disk directly or setting up a V-Disk.
